General.Name: Krishana Phoschem Limited
General.Description: Krishana Phoschem Limited manufactures and sells fertilizers and chemicals in India. The company offers benefited rock phosphate, single super phosphate (SSP), granulated SSP, H-acid, intermediate dyes, sulphuric acid, sulphonic acid, oleum, liquid SO3, calcium nitrate, and other allied chemicals, as well as micro nutrients, supplement, and organic products under the Annadata brand. It also engages in the contract manufacturing of chemicals. The company was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Bhilwara, India. Krishana Phoschem Limited is a subsidiary of OstwalPhoschem (India) Limited.
General.Address: 5-O-20, Basement R.C. Vyas Colony, Bhilwara, India, 311001
